commands.speaker: You
commands.line: What do you think of this design for the throne to put on the stage?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Oh, wow! I love it! However, can we really make something this ornate?

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: We're going to be using a prop chair, so it should work if we wrap it nicely enough in satin or something. What do you think, Maki?

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Hey, Maki? Hello?

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Oh... Sorry, I was thinking about my study schedule for this test. I can't very well get a bad grade on it, can I?

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: This performance, the test, and my piano recital are all happening at the same time. It's really bad timing.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: That sounds quite hectic. We can handle the behind-the-scenes work for the princess performance, so please do not push yourself too hard.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: No, I want to help out. I appreciate the sentiment, but I'd hate to back out now. I want to see this through 'til the end.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Now's the time when I need to buckle down and focus the most, but I can't seem to relax. I'm not making any progress at all.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Hmm... I wish there was something we could do to help.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: I know! I thought of a great idea! Maki, let's go!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Go? Go where?!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: *Pant* *Pant* Don't rush me like that!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Whenever you can't relax or seem to get in the right headspace, that's when you need to come to the ocean!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: I mean, I'm grateful and all, but I don't really have the time to be doing something like...

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Oh wow, the weather is gorgeous! The sun is just sparkling on the sea.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Huh?

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Was the sea always this...wide?

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Sorry for dragging you out here even though you're busy. But...isn't it more important to take a break and relax when it feels like you can't afford to?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Any time you need a change of pace, we'll be here to help you achieve it.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: It's been kind of a while since I smelled the salty ocean breeze... I definitely don't hate it.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Thank you, both of you. I was freaking out too much to keep a good perspective on things, I guess.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: The ocean just might be the thing I needed to reset my mood. I think I can really buckle down now once I get home.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: *Giggle* Good, I'm glad. Once your test and everything is over, come on over to Uchiura to hang out.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Thank you! I definitely will.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: There we go, now you look like yourself again!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: I guess it's a bad habit of mine to try and fix all my problems on my own.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: I'm truly a lucky girl to have friends who'll watch out for me like you guys.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Maki, did you say something?

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Nope, nothing! Okay, let's head back. I'm ready to make some major progress!
